text: Interferon Signalling pathway was significantly associated to up-regulated genes in DAN and ILI group, but not in BOR group. Previous reports showed that PRRSV proteins, including nsp1, nsp2, nsp11, and N, have been identified and characterized as IFN antagonists [27, 28] . Nsp1 has been considered as multifunctional protein regulating type I IFN responses [29] [30] [31] [32] , and nsp11 and N protein have been described to suppress IFN-Î² induction by antagonizing IRF3 activation [33, 34] . Interestingly, we did not observe upregulation of Interferon Signalling pathway in BOR group, where the expression of N protein encoding gene reached the highest level.
